idea:
VSPL is a corporation based in the India with offices in Mumbai and Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra. 

The company is run by an experienced and seasoned management team with extensive expertise in digital media, web services, security, and the mobile applications. 

VSPL is a new way of simplified approaches to help the users in solving the day-to-day problems.  We believe in solving real world problems using next gen technologies.

Our focus is on making the end-users life simple by providing reliable solutions to end-user's traditional work.

idea: Novela films is engaged in Advertising & Digital Video Production. We are developing an App as a Flagship product, this app will Provide all the services required for any kind of shoot on a click to a button and create Cost Transparency for clients and promote digital payments and reduce cash transactions, It will also help to organise the unstructured Media & Film Industry.
name: Novela Films Private Limited

idea:
India Water Exchange will be Countries first Exchange to allow trading of Fresh water/Treated Water/ Specific Purpose Industrial Water and Finally Inter state Connectivity and trading   for initially Industrial Customers then slowly for Housing Societies , Clubs, Hotels, restaurants, commercial shopping areas , stadiums , Golf courses , construction sites , schools , Malls , public gardens and then if Governments allow we can look at Inter state Water Sharing and trading agreements . If you look at Mumbai itself thousands of gallons of treated water is thrown into the sea due lack of proper arrangements of buying and selling and also transportation which otherwise could generate so much of additional revenue for Muncipal corporations and also satisfy demands of Customers who can attain extra productivity which can further generate taxes for the Government due to higher production . I have personally met so many Municipal authorities and they are keen to implement it . 

To Implement this we need a solid technology back up and government permissions and ground staff to get people registered and market this and spread it as a only go to exchange for water needs . 

It can be money spinner for the Company as well as Municipal Corporations and also Governments
name: India Water Exchange
